title: How to Delete a Steam Account

steps.headline: Go to store.steampowered.com in your browser.
Log in with your Steam account name and password.
Find your account name in the upper right-hand corner.
steps.description: Click on it, and select "Account Details" from the drop-down list.

steps.headline: Scroll down and you should see a "Delete Account" button.
Click the "Proceed to Account Deletion" button.
steps.description: That will initiate the process of account deletion.

steps.headline: Fill out the entire form to verify ownership of the account that you are deleting.
Check your email.
steps.description: Steam support will email you to verify your information. After you click the link, your account will be locked for 30 days. After that, it's gone for good!

text: Go to store.steampowered.com in your browser.  Log in with your Steam account name and password.  Find your account name in the upper right-hand corner. Click on it, and select "Account Details" from the drop-down list. Scroll down and you should see a "Delete Account" button. Click it. Click the "Proceed to Account Deletion" button. That will initiate the process of account deletion. Fill out the entire form to verify ownership of the account that you are deleting. Submit it when you’re done. Check your email. Steam support will email you to verify your information. After you click the link, your account will be locked for 30 days. After that, it's gone for good!
